page.title: 09Playground Games
page.content: We children play some funny games in the playground. I've made a graph showing twenty games like these kiss- chase, leapfrog, red rover, orange balls, bog roll, bulldog football, hockey rounders. Leapfrog and bulldog are the most popular. In{leapfrog}two or more people bend down and one person jumps over them with legs astride.{Bulldog}is simple. One person tries to hit you as you run by. If you are touched you are{"on it" also and have to chase the others until everyone is touched. In{bog roll}a line of people run around until they are tangled and then they untangle. In{orange balls}some children get in a ring and fall down on a certain word and the last one down goes away and the rest say a boy's name and that's the boy who the person that went way loves.
